trans-unit.source: Represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile that is associated with a bitmap image.
The supported standard color spaces are sRGB, ScRGB, RGB, CMYK, Gray, Multichannel, and unknown.

Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile located at a given <xref:System.Uri>.
To use any of the unsupported color profiles, you must install one and use its URI to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext> by using the ColorContext constructor.
The <xref:System.Uri> that identifies the location of the desired color profile.

Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> with the standard color profile (sRGB or RGB ) that most closely matches the supplied <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref> from which the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> is derived.
Determines whether an <xref:System.Object> is equal to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Object> to compare for equality.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the supplied <xref:System.Object> is equal to this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the hash code for this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref>.
An <xref:System.Int32> that represents the hash code for the object.
Operates on two instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> to determine equality.
The first instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> to compare.
The second instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> to compare.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Operates on two instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> to determine that they are not equal.
The first instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> to compare.
The second instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> to compare.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> are not equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a readable <xref:System.IO.Stream> of raw color profile data.
A readable <xref:System.IO.Stream> of raw color profile data.

Gets a <xref:System.Uri> that represents the location of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile.
A <xref:System.Uri> that represents the location of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile.
